    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()

        Returns:
        the integer input on creation of given object.

      • getArray

        public java.lang.String[] getArray()
        Returns the String array containing the markings of the ship.
        Returns:
        an array containing size amount of " Z".

      • getPosArray

        public int[] getPosArray(int choise)
        Returns and array containing the position of the Ship on the playing field.
        Parameters:
        choise - with 1 returns the Y axis and with 2 the X axis.
        Returns:
        an array containing the chosen axis.

      • lowerDeathCounter

        public void lowerDeathCounter()
        Lowers the death counter of a Ship with 1.

      • getDeathCounter

        public int getDeathCounter()
        Returns the deathCounter.
        Returns:
        the integer value of the deathCounter variable.

      • randomlyPlaceShip

        public Board randomlyPlaceShip(Board x)
        Places 5 ships randomly on a playing field and returns it.

        Automatically inserts 5 ships of the lengths of 2, 3, 3, 4 and 5 on a chosen playing field. The placement follows the rules of the game battleship. After placing the ships the playing field will be returned.

        Parameters:
        x - the board to with the ships will be added.
        Returns:
        the playing field with 5 ships placed.

      • chosenShipLocation

        public void chosenShipLocation(Board x,
                      int posY,
                      int posX,
                      java.lang.String direction,
                      int shipLength)
        Places a ship to a pre-chosen spot on a playing field.
        Parameters:
        x - the board to which the ship will be placed.
        posY - the Y axis position of the ship.
        posX - the X axis position of the ship.
        direction - the direction to which the ship was chosen to be placed.
        shipLength - the length of the ship to be placed.
